DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional study to retrospectively validate the technical use TLS (Tape Locking Screw) in the anterior cruciate ligament. The investigators goal is to test the validity of the technique and its positive influence on the resumption of sporting activities in relation to the existing literature.
DOC.brief_title: ACL Reconstruction With the TLS Technique
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years Patients operated in the service in 2014 to care for endstage knee osteoarthritis by implantation of a total knee prosthesis. Patients under 18 years
